analysis.description:
TokenVestingContract.getReleasableFunds (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#149-167) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balance == 0 || (startTime >= now)

Reentrancy in TokenVestingContract.checkForReceivedTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#211-218):
	External calls:
	- getTokenBalance() != internalBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#212-218)
	- receivedFunds = getTokenBalance().sub(internalBalance) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#213-216)
	- internalBalance = getTokenBalance() (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#216)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- internalBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#216)

Reentrancy in VestingMasterContract.checkForReceivedTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#341-351):
	External calls:
	- getTokenBalance() != internalBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#343-351)
	- receivedFunds = getTokenBalance().sub(internalBalance) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#346)
	- internalBalance = getTokenBalance() (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#347-348)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- internalBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#347-348)

Reentrancy in VestingMasterContract.fundVesting (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#303-314):
	External calls:
	- checkForReceivedTokens() (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#304-305)
	- require(bool)((internalBalance >= _amount) && (getTokenBalance() >= _amount)) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#305-306)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- internalBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#309)

Reentrancy in TokenVestingContract.release (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#173-189):
	External calls:
	- checkForReceivedTokens() (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#175-176)
	- amountToTransfer = getReleasableFunds() (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#177)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- alreadyReleasedAmount (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#178-180)
	- internalBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#180-181)

TokenVestingContract.release (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#173-189) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(beneficiary,amountToTransfer) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#185-187)

TokenVestingContract.revoke (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#189-203) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(beneficiary,releasableFunds) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#192-193)
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(owner,getTokenBalance()) (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#198-199)

TokenVestingContract.salvageOtherTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#218-229) does not use the value returned by external calls:

VestingMasterContract.fundVesting (/unique_chucks/10/0x4ed85ace60083f2fe413554a015af15e59b618d2.sol#303-314) does not use the value returned by external calls:
